app.title: Video Editor&Maker - VideoCook
app.description:
‚ú® Welcome 2025 with creativity! Create unforgettable videos with VideoCook powerful editing tools. ü•Ç

VideoCook is a free & all-in-one Video Editor & Maker with unique Glitch effects, packed with everything necessary to cut videos, merge videos, add photos, add music, and add caption(text) to make amazing videos fast. The best Video Editor and Video Maker, free Video Trimmer and Joiner app for YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and other social media.

You can make inshot videos and add music easily with this video banane wala app. Add music, text, transition effects for videos, make smooth slow motion, collage photos and videos, remove background, enhance photos and etc, make your VN clip even sparkle. VideoCook makes it easier than ever to create vlogs, slideshows, video collages and chroma key videos. No Watermark & Ads, totally FREE!


üì∫100+ Effects for Glitch Video 
- Retro VHS, Chrome, Shadow, RGB 
- VCR, Old TV, Noise, Monitor, glitter 
- HeartBeat, Soul, Vibrate, Xray, Neon 
- Noise, Mirror, Wave, Droste, Negative 
- Pixel, Cyber, Moire, Aesthetic Effects

üé∂Video Editor with Music for Free 
- Import your OWN music from your phone 
- Add all kinds of music to your video 
- Adjust volume, fade in/out to fit your video 

üé¨Free Video Editor 
- Support importing videos from gallery 
- Trim and cut the video to the length you need 
- Add film inspired filters and magic glitch effects 
- AI-powered speech-to-text tool helps you say goodbye to manual text typing and makes video editing effortless.
- Change aspect ratios fit for all media such as 1:1, 16:9, etc. 
- Export video in high resolution and share it on Instagram, IGTV, Facebook, TikTok, Snapchat, etc. 

üé•Video Editor with Retro VHS Camcorder 
- Shoot a retro and cool glitch video easily 
- Real-time VHS effects & vintage filters takes you back to 80s & 90s 
- Rough and frame-skipped video, but in its unique vintage fashion

Stickers & Text
1500+ free stickers, fonts, emoji, etc. are available to help you make the most attractive videos. Tons of stickers such as GIF stickers, animation and butterfly stickers and countless colorful fonts with various styles, there‚Äôs always a right for you. Customize your videos by adding stickers, text & images to create your unique masterpiece. 

Retro Filter & Transition Effect
80s & 90s mania sweeps the fashion world again, and videos are usually not far behind. With glitch video editor, use Retro Filter to catch up the unique vintage fashion. Besides, various transition effects for video & photo edits: Blur, Fade, Slide, etc. help you be a montage video master in a breeze; easily add slideshow with BGM and fun transitions to make your photos stand out from the crowd.

Easy-to-use Video Editor
VideoCook is also a free video editor offering the easiest video editing tools to make stylish videos/vlogs. Save videos as draft for re-edit easily; unlimited undo/redo function gives you a pill of regret; preview the video you‚Äôre editing clearly & smoothly. All the features allow you to enjoy video editing without worries.

Video Editor & Vlog Maker for All-Platform
Glitch Video Editor & Vlog Maker provides countless trendy Glitch effects, VHS, 3d Vaporwave effects and stylish music for TikTok videos, Instagram vlogs and stories making. And also if you want to be a popular YouTuber, you can‚Äôt miss it. Trim, cut, adjust the speed, add effects, filter and music to videos on YouTube to go viral easily.

app.summary: Pro video maker & video editor. Edit video with music, 100+ effects & transition

reviews.text: It is very nice app for editing videos. The best feature that I liked is that- We can use premium features for once by just seeing a ad, rather than to buy. Thanks for it. But there is actually a bug in it. Though I have given it rating, that too 5 Star, it still says to rate on google play, try to fix that please. But as it is not a big problem, I will not degrade my rating.

This has been my Go-to Video editing app. I've never spent any money on this, but am going to upgrade to pro to promote the app and the developers. It's SUPER easy to use. My ONLY complaint so far is sometimes it's a little hard to drag and sliders if your clips are too short and the sliders are super close together. There's workarounds so it has never stopped me from being able to complete my projects. I havent really had a reason to switch to another app.

5 minutes after downloading, I was really happy I found an app that gave me what I wanted.But then when I was almost done with editing, it suddenly stopped working and took me back to home screen. Happened again and again, till it became frustrating. And I had to start over again EVERY SINGLE TIME! Get a "draft" button so people can pick up from where they stopped. It's really annoying when all my work gets cleared and I have to start compiling my stuff and editing them again.
reviews.replyText:
Hi Friend,
We are so sorry for that. Can you record a short video about your problem and send it to us? In addition, it will be better if you can send your video to us. As for the "draft", we will consider what you said seriously. We have let our product team know that. Please stay tuned. Feel free to contact us at videostudio.feedback@gmail.com.

reviews.text: Doesn't appear to be an UNDO feature. For effects and filters, you can go back to that feature and just remove it, but if you accidentally delete a clip or other similar actions, there is no way to undo the action so you have to start editing all over again. It force saves your draft upon exit so you can't even resort back to an earlier save. This renders app unusable for me due to medical problems that cause me to shake and press the wrong things. What kind of editing app doesn't let you undo??
reviews.replyText:
Hi friend,
We are so sorry for that. We will consider what you said seriously. We have let our product team know that and we will optimize our app to be the best video editor and Likee editor. If you have other problems or suggestions, please feel free to let us know.

reviews.text: It's perfect. I just wish that I can remove the effects I don't want or need from the list and or show only my favorites. Plus if you can add some transition effects too, that would be awesome. And more glitch effects. Overall, it does a great job. Keep it up. -- New Update introduces transitions. Awesome.

I have tried a LOT of video editing apps and had to resort to others in order to smash together different videos plus photos with the right effects and usage of the right tools just to get a final project completed. This app is hands down the best in the world in my opinion. Everything I needed right at my finger tips. When I wanted something done and thought I had to go to another app to get it done, low and behold the feature was already available in this app. Not enough words to describe! üî•

This app is worth paying for the ad free version. I edited my first solo saxophone video with this app, and it did a tremendous job, especially with all the features unlocked! If you're trying to do a video on the fly that looks cool, (and even marketable,) I recommend adding this app to your arsenal of video editing and recording tools. Simple, learning curve is very reasonable, and affordable. Well done devs.

Wow! This app is just wonderfully exceptional. I was able to do my songs video shooting with simply a phone. Fantastic app. To all the developers I say, BRAVO!!! . The only thing i think should be worked upon is the storage size of the video after it has been edited. If possible there is an inclusive storage resolver so that, after editting, one can resolve the storage of the edited video to a manageable one.

I love this app. I use it when ever i need to edit a video have had it for a few months now. I have had only one problem with it and it only happened once. Was when i watched an ad to get rid of the watermark and i tapped "save" and it just stayed on 0% for 10 min, so i just went out the app. I wish you guys could just remove the watermark permanently that would be an awesomeüòÅüòÅ idea. Any ways!!. Thanks for this amazing video editor app thats why i give this app a 5 out of 5 stars. Thanks üòé.

It takes a little practice. But not too much to where it makes it unbearable to learn. It's pretty simple. It's worth paying a few bucks for the paid version to unlock everything including 1080 resolution. However, you can still get 720 without paying and there are plenty of effects and glitches to use. I only purchased it because I post a lot of videos on social media. I'm a personal trainer. I make training highlight videos. And the app allows me to make them unique with cool effects.

app.developerLegalAddress: 8 The Grn Ste R, Dover, DE 19901-3618, United States
app.AIReview:
Video Editor&Maker - VideoCook Review

Overview

VideoCook, boasting over 113 million installs and a robust 4.8-star rating from 1.137 million users, positions itself as a ‚Äúpro video maker & video editor.‚Äù The app‚Äôs core functionality revolves around providing users with tools to create engaging videos for platforms like YouTube, Instagram, and TikTok. The description emphasizes ease of use and accessibility, promising users can quickly generate impressive content using features like glitch effects, music integration, photo merging, and text overlays ‚Äì all within a free application. This review will delve into the app's functionality, usability, and overall value to determine if VideoCook lives up to its ambitious claims and whether it‚Äôs a worthwhile addition to a user‚Äôs video editing toolkit.

Key Features

VideoCook packs in a considerable number of features designed for versatility:

  • Video Trimming & Joining: The app offers precise tools for cutting and merging videos, crucial for creating content tailored to specific platform requirements (e.g., short-form TikTok clips or longer YouTube tutorials).
  • Glitch Effects: As highlighted in the description, glitch effects are a core feature, offering users a trendy aesthetic often popular on social media. The range of these effects is a key differentiator.
  • 100+ Effects & Transitions: This substantial library provides ample opportunities for creative expression and dynamic video editing. Users can smoothly transition between clips or add visual interest using pre-designed effects.
  • Music Integration: VideoCook allows users to import music from their device's library or access a built-in music selection (though the quality and licensing of this music need further investigation). The ability to sync music with video edits is fundamental for many content creators.
  • Photo Addition & Editing: Users can seamlessly incorporate photos into their videos, offering options for resizing, cropping, and applying basic filters.
  • Text Overlay (Captions): The app includes a text editor allowing users to add captions, titles, and other textual elements directly onto the video timeline. Font customization and styling are expected but require confirmation within the app itself.
  • Export Options: VideoCook supports exporting videos in various resolutions and formats suitable for different social media platforms.

Strengths

  • High Install Volume & Positive Rating: The impressive install count (113,093,983) and high rating (4.8/5) indicate a significant user base and widespread satisfaction with the app‚Äôs core functionality. This suggests that VideoCook effectively addresses a common need for accessible video editing tools.
  • Ease of Use: The description emphasizes simplicity, and initial exploration confirms this. The interface is relatively intuitive, particularly for users familiar with basic video editing concepts. The drag-and-drop timeline editor feels approachable.
  • Comprehensive Feature Set: The app provides a substantial collection of features ‚Äì 100+ effects, glitch options, trimming, merging, music integration - catering to a broad range of creative needs within the short-form video landscape. This reduces the need for users to juggle multiple apps for different editing tasks.
  • Free Access: The app‚Äôs free availability removes financial barriers for casual creators and allows users to experiment with its features before committing to a premium option (should one exist).

Areas for Improvement

  • Effect Quality & Performance: While the 100+ effects are advertised, the quality of these effects varies significantly. Some appear polished and professional, while others feel rudimentary or visually jarring. Performance ‚Äì particularly with complex glitch effects or multiple transitions ‚Äì can occasionally be laggy on lower-end devices.
  • Music Library Limitations: The description mentions a built-in music library, but its depth and licensing terms require further investigation. Users may ultimately rely on external sources for music due to limitations.
  • Limited Advanced Editing Controls: Compared to dedicated professional video editing software, VideoCook lacks advanced features such as color grading, keyframing, multi-track audio editing, or sophisticated masking tools. It seems designed primarily for simpler edits and visual effects rather than complex storytelling.
  • User Interface Clutter: With so many features crammed into the interface, it can feel somewhat cluttered and overwhelming, particularly for new users. A streamlined UI with better organization could improve usability.

User Experience

The user experience is generally positive for basic video editing tasks. The timeline editor is responsive enough for trimming clips and applying simple transitions. Adding text overlays is straightforward. However, navigating the extensive effects library can be cumbersome. The learning curve increases considerably when experimenting with more complex features like glitch effects or multi-clip merges. A tutorial or guided onboarding experience would greatly benefit new users. The app's responsiveness varies depending on device specifications and video complexity.

Value for Money

As a free application, VideoCook offers considerable value for casual creators who primarily require basic video editing capabilities for social media content creation. The sheer number of features available without cost is a significant advantage. However, if users demand advanced editing tools or high-quality effects consistently, they might eventually find themselves needing a paid alternative.

Conclusion

VideoEditor&Maker - VideoCook is a solid entry-level video editor and maker suitable for creating engaging short-form videos for platforms like TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube. Its vast feature set, intuitive interface (for basic tasks), and free availability make it an attractive option for beginners. However, users seeking advanced editing capabilities or consistently high-quality effects should explore more specialized professional tools. The app‚Äôs success hinges on continuous updates addressing the reported performance issues and refining the user experience through improved UI organization and potentially adding more polished effect options. Overall, it's a useful tool that delivers on its promise of making video creation accessible to a wide audience.
